1. Heifers

The term "heifers" refers to young cattle that have not yet given birth to a calf. It is a common term used in the livestock industry. Therefore, "heifers" is a collective noun representing a group of young cattle. Hence, it is considered a "Person" entity in the context of agriculture and livestock farming.
